title: Electroencephalographist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scan a player each night, learning 10 random roles that could be in this game, at least 4 of which are Town and 3 of which are evil, one of which is their role.
- ⚡⚡⚡ Scan a player at night, learning their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you scan for a player's role, this role card permanently loses one of the ⚡s in its second ability. If it has none, you can't learn players' roles.
- Whenever you scan for a player's role, in the next game whose host complies and where you have a role with an ability that doesn't have limited charges, the first ability you have that doesn't have limited charges can only be used thrice.
- Whenever you scan an evil player, they will learn that you did so and the result you received.
